name: Warring Souls
description:
From ever autumn forest to slimy swamps, fight monster after monster and gain gold and levels. Become the strongest floaty sword wielding one out there. Collect swords, discover secrets, battle them all.

This game is about a little gray character who takes on the world with a sword that floats in front of him. Souls who war even after death are forged into weapons and unleashed on the world.

There is a gold for ad system, in case you die and run out of gold or just don't want to fight everything. The gold you get from ads scales with your level.

This game has some RPG aspects, and the combat is a one click cool down. The cool down effects how much damage you do, so you can attack alot, it just may not do any good.
